name: Morbus (Marcos Engelhard, GoncaloIndi)
description:
Morbus is a first-person 3D horror game where you explore an infected house, full of secrets. Why are you there? Only you can find out...

Controls: 

 Movement: ASWD;

 Sprint: SHIFT;

 Open doors: Left Mouse Button;

 Pickup: E;

 Inventory: TAB;

Team Kitten: 

  Marcos Engelhard: Lead Programmer;

  Gonçalo Indi: Programmer and UI artist;

  Gean Silva: 3D artist;

  Sofia Silva: 3D artist;

  Ricardo Oliveira: Level designer and Sound designer
